question: [Review] Polski: Podaj which integer bin occurs most frequently na podstawie histogramu.

qas.question: [Review] Polski: Podaj which integer bin occurs most frequently na podstawie histogramu.
[Calm] Italiano: Riporta how many samples were used in total dal istogramma.
[Calm] Deutsch: Gib how many entries fall inside the modal bin anhand des Histogramms an.
